general.heroDescriptionIntegrations: Cicada offers a powerful API for perfectly integrating third-party systems into your processes. In order to establish proper communication, Cicada requires external applications to authenticate through individual security keys first. You can create those individual keys right here, enabling you to track changes, introduced by external applications, separately.

detail.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this integration?
detail.hintCreateNewApiKeys: The regeneration of the API access keys requires updating all associated scripts or applications.
detail.secretHelpText: Please note down the access key now. After saving the integration, the key will no longer be visible, due to safety concerns.
